1.content:
So, a little info about James.

James lives in the wonderful city of New York. He's made his way around, having stayed in wealthy hotels, as well as living in the wooded areas nearby. He's always tried to keep himself hidden from humans, for fear of what they'd do to him, but this doesn't mean he could not, or should not benefit from their spoils.
James has dark hair, and he wears clothes sewn together from random loose strings he's found during his time in the Big Apple.
James is incredibly small, smaller than most insects, so it's unsurprising that most human eyes do not see him moving about.
Out of everything James hates about humans, he hates their feet the most. The smell is appalling to him, and due to the nature of his kind, he's unable to pass out, causing him to endure every stinky moment, if he's accidentally caught by one.
Lastly, he has a lot of energy, considering his kind doesn't sleep, so it's unsurprising if he travels far distances in a day.

This all being said, we now need a setting, so...

Where do we start off our story?
1.title: Your adventure starts here.

11.content:
James woke up from the bright rays of the morning sun. Getting up from the ground, he looked up to the hole that leads to the outside. He lived underground in the middle of the Central Park where he lived most of the time though he does move into several places around New York from time to time. "I wonder if I could go outside..." he said as he slowly made his way to the overground.

Where is he right now?
11.title: Central Park

15.content:
Whose home is it?

Jessie: 27 year old single woman with a job as a store clerk that keeps her on her feet all day.

Laura and Kate:16 and 17 year old lesbian couple kicked out of their parents house when the parents found out.

Emily, Tina, and Veronica: 36 year old single mom that walks around alot, 13 year old daughter with high heels, and 2 year old daughter that loves playing barefoot in the mud and hates washing her feet. but wheres shoes when going places.

Heather: 12 year old girl left alone for the next month as her parents are on their second honeymoon, and they trust her to be responsible like Veronica she loves walking barefoot in the mud and hates washing her feet, however unlike Veronica who wears shoes when going places, Heather wears sweltering hot knee high boots,. she also has both a dog, named Luna for her silver for, and a cat named Mittens due to the whites on her otherwise black paws. Because of this she sometimes accidentally steps in dog or cat poop instead of mud, but even when it is inside, and not her accidentally stepping in the cat litter she just picks up what's on tne ground, and ignores whats on her feet.

So whose house is it? or is it someone else's house?
15.title: who's home?

info.brief_description: James, a being very similar to human, deals daily with his life of trying to avoid humans.
info.description:
This story is all about James, being a tiny person, in a world full of regular sized people.

Some notes to make here

James cannot die.
There are none others of his kind, he's the last of his kind.
Despite living this life for 21 years, James can still make very careless mistakes.

As for rules

No Male Giants
This is primarily a feet story, but I will allow other fetishes.
Try not to give short chapters.
Make sure you spell/grammar check before you post.

Other than that, you're free to add as you please.
